title: Carbon Emission Reduction Strategies in Education Through Digital Teaching and Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and practical experience in educational settings
context.additional_context: A course for pre-/in-service teachers focusing on establishing and implementing carbon reduction strategies using digital tools.

learning_goals: Designing three practical strategies to reduce carbon emissions by over 30% during educational activities using digital teaching and learning tools.
Analyzing carbon emission status by educational field and writing a 1,000-character report evaluating the applicability of digital technologies.
Developing one low-carbon digital teaching and learning module applicable to actual classes and deriving improvements through peer evaluation.

resources: Comparative Analysis of Digital Educational Tools
Casebook of Carbon Neutrality in Education

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
